turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need an update on my homeowner's insurance claim, reference number HW7890. It's for the storm damage last month. I submitted everything a few weeks ago, and I'm starting to get a bit worried about the delays.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I understand your concern regarding the status of your claim. I can look that up for you. Could you please confirm the policy holder's full name and date of birth for security verification?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, it's Jane Doe, born on 05/20/1975. The claim number is definitely HW7890. Can you tell me *exactly* what stage it's at? Is it being reviewed? Why is it taking so long? I need to get repairs done soon, this is frustrating!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Ms. Doe. I have located claim number HW7890. According to our system, your claim is currently assigned to an adjuster and is in the initial assessment phase. Due to a high volume of claims following the recent storm, processing times may be slightly longer than usual. We appreciate your patience. The adjuster will contact you directly regarding the next steps or if any additional information is needed. We are working diligently to resolve claims as quickly as possible.
